tool_description: Calculates optimal radiographic exposure parameters including kVp, mAs, and focal spot size based on patient characteristics and imaging requirements.

patient_thickness.description: Patient thickness at imaging site in centimeters

equipment_type.description: X-ray equipment type (digital, computed radiography, film)

grid_usage.description: Whether anti-scatter grid is being used

focal_film_distance.description: Distance from focal spot to detector in centimeters

motion_concern.description: Whether patient motion is a concern

error_messages: Invalid thickness: Patient thickness must be between 1-50 cm.
Unsupported body part: Body part must be a recognized anatomical region.
Invalid equipment type: Equipment must be digital, computed radiography, or film.
Invalid distance: Focal film distance must be between 40-180 cm.
Invalid contrast preference: Must be high, medium, or low.
Parameter combination error: Selected parameters may result in poor image quality.
usage: Provide patient_thickness, body_part, equipment_type, grid_usage, and focal_film_distance. Optionally set contrast_preference and motion_concern. Returns optimal exposure parameters.

focal_spot_size.description: Recommended focal spot size (small, medium, large)
